content: with its classic shape and vintage charm the cottage coin pouch isn t only a great companion to securely hold onto coins but also all those little bits and trinkets that tend to loosely fly around in bags and drawers like stitch markers darning needles and so on **yarn** designed for a standard metal closure https //amzn eu/d/3o5uo2s it only uses about 30-60m 33-66 yards of yarn offering itself as a perfect canvas to display those special scraps and mini skeins it can be worked using fingering weight yarn held double held with a strand of mohair or with a single strand of dk **construction** the cottage coin pouch is worked in the round starting at the bottom with a magic loop cast on it s worked in one piece then bound off before being sewn into the metal frame **required skills** - knitting in the round - magic loop cast on the pattern has a tutorial link for this - binding off the pattern has a tutorial link for this
